What is the outlook for Chronic Inflammatory Demyelinating Polyneuropathy (CIDP) ?,"The course of CIDP varies widely among individuals. Some may have a bout of CIDP followed by spontaneous recovery, while others may have many bouts with partial recovery in between relapses.
